item.title: Hello world!
item.dc:creator: admin
item.content:encoded: Welcome to WordPress. This is your first post. Edit or delete it, then start blogging!

wp:comment.wp:comment_content:
Hi, this is a comment.
To delete a comment, just log in and view the post's comments. There you will have the option to edit or delete them.

item.title: The Grumpy King (Video Format)
item.dc:creator: admin
item.content:encoded: Directed By Jonny & Will Using their unique ability to create magical puppet characters and the worlds they inhabit, Blinkink new signings Jonny and Will have written and directed a masterful series of short and hilarious sketches. The character-led shorts are rammed full of slapstick gags and cartoon action, all performed with live action, in-camera techniques. The puppets, costumes, props and sets, all hand-made by the directors and their team, combine to create an authentic medieval atmosphere; the perfect backdrop for the silly, fun, and sometimes menacing nature of the characters’ relationship. Scored with original music, also by Jonny and Will and featuring timeless character performances these shorts will enjoyed by kids of any age. Source and excerpt from Vimeo Staff Picks on Vimeo.

wp:postmeta.wp:meta_value: <iframe src="http://player.vimeo.com/video/46484602" width="242" height="136" frameborder="0" webkitAllowFullScreen mozallowfullscreen allowFullScreen></iframe>
